title: Exit (1995) Caliber Comics Nabiel Kanan complete 2nd volume
description:
I couldn't find the first volume (it's in storage) so I thought I'll upload the second volume....


One of the most acclaimed series ever to come out of Caliber's stable. See what all the excitement and hype is about and check out this excellent series. Exit, one of the break-through cult hits of 1996, is the story of friendship, love, and the hazards of growing up. See why Exit has been heralded as one of the best comics of the last decade and winner of the best small press title in the UK.


It is the story of the most basic of interests-human interaction. Exit is sure to appeal to the readers of popular self-published titles and fans of the work of such talents as Paul Pope, James Owens, and Bernie Mireault, as well as those who appreciate strong stories and interesting characterization. Now is the time to jump on and join the  adventures from one of the industryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up and coming talents.
 

It is summer. SchoolÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s out forever and thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a new world lying in wait for Karl and his friends. A world they must now navigate whether they want to or not.
 

A tragedy and a comedy, Exit is the story of people who canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t find the map. Written and illustrated by Nabiel Kanan.

Caliber published the second volume which ran five issues plus an epilogue.


Enjoy and SEED
